page.title: 07POLICE WORK IN GT. WAKERING
page.content: IN GREAT WAKERING THERE IS A SMALL POLICE STATION, ITS TELEPHONE NUMBER IS 219236. THE TWO OFFICERS ARE P.C. PICKERING AND P.C. JACKSON. THEY WORK A SHIFT SYSTEM WITH ONE OFFICER ON DUTY FROM 9.00 A.M. UNTIL 5 P.M. AND THEN THE OTHER OFFICER IS ON DUTY UNTIL 1.00 A.M. IF THE POLICE ARE NEEDED WHEN AN OFFICER IS NOT ON DUTY THEN THE SHOEBURYNESS OR SOUTHEND POLICE SATIONS HAVE TO BE CONTACTED.THE MAIN CRIMINAL ACTIVITIES IN THIS AREA ARE VANDLISM AND BURGLARY. THIS AREA IS RELATIVELY PEACEFUL IN COMPARISON WITH NEIGHBOURING AREAS. THE POLICEMEN WEAR UNIFORM BUT DO NOT GO ON PARADE EACH MORNING AS THEY DO AT THE LARGER STATIONS. THEY BOTH CARRY TRUNCHEONS AND DRIVE CARS.
